title: Sparkling Gold Bangles: A Touch of Tradition with Modern Elegance
materials: meticulously crafted with brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Finished with our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting lustre.
features: These bangles feature a contemporary design with delicate gold lines punctuated by sparkling CZ stones. The stones are set in a geometric pattern, creating a modern yet timeless appeal. The sleek and minimalist form adds to its versatility.
colors: Radiant gold and dazzling white (CZ stones).
occasions: and even as a subtle statement piece for weddings and receptions.
description: These bangles offer the perfect blend of modern design and traditional craftsmanship. The high-quality gold ensures durability, while the CZ stones provide a brilliant sparkle. The Hyderabadi Polish guarantees a long-lasting shine. A versatile piece, these bangles will add elegance to any outfit.
